verses.verse: By the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> there we sat <S%H3427>down.<s%> <S%H1058>Yes,<s%> we wept, when we <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
On the <S%H6155>willows<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> we <S%H8518>hung<s%> up our <S%H3658>harps.<s%>

For <S%H7617>there,<s%> those who led us captive <S%H7592>asked<s%> us for <S%H1697>songs.<s%> Those who <S%H8437>tormented<s%> us demanded <S%H1697>songs<s%> of <S%H7891>joy:<s%> "Sing us one of the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%>"
If I <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3389>you,<s%> Jerusalem, let my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> forget its <S%H7911>skill.<s%>

Let my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to the roof of my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> if I <S%H2142>don't<s%> remember <S%H5927>you;<s%> if I don't prefer <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> above my <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> who <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6168>"Raze<s%> <S%H6168>it!<s%> Raze it even to its <S%H3247>foundation!<s%>"
<S%H1323>Daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> doomed to <S%H7703>destruction,<s%> he will be <S%H835>happy<s%> who <S%H7999>rewards<s%> <S%H1580>you,<s%> as you have served us.
<S%H835>Happy<s%> shall he <S%H270>be,<s%> who takes and <S%H5310>dashes<s%> your little <S%H5768>ones<s%> against the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>
